nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', latest(PollingHealthReason) AS 'Health Reason', latest(currentFirmwareVersion), latest(securityDefUpdates), latest(serial_number) WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf' and instrumentation.name not like 'ping'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Current Load Average 1m' WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Current Memory Utilization %' WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf'

FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Min Load Average', max(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Max Load Average', average(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Average Load Average' WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Min Memory', max(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Max Memory', average(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Average Memory' WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.IfInUtilization) AS 'RX %', latest(kentik.snmp.IfOutUtilization) AS 'TX %', latest(ifOperStatus) OR latest(if_OperStatus) AS 'Operational Status', latest(kentik.snmp.ifInErrorPercent) AS 'RX Error %', latest(kentik.snmp.ifOutErrorPercent) AS 'TX Error %' FACET if_name or if_interface_name AS 'Interface', if_Alias AS 'Interface Alias', if_Speed AS 'Interface Speed' WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf' LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT average(kentik.snmp.IfInUtilization) as 'RX %' FACET if_interface_name WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES LIMIT 10
FROM Metric SELECT average(kentik.snmp.IfOutUtilization) as 'RX %' FACET if_interface_name WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES LIMIT 10
FROM Metric SELECT rate(max(kentik.snmp.ifHCInOctets)*8/1000/1000, 1 second) AS 'Mbps' FACET if_interface_name WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf' TIMESERIES 5 minutes
FROM Metric SELECT rate(max(kentik.snmp.ifHCOutOctets)*8/1000/1000, 1 second) AS 'Mbps' FACET if_interface_name WHERE provider = 'kentik-waf' TIMESERIES 5 minutes

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyActiveConn), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyFullHandshakes), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyResumptionHandshakes), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyHandshakeAttempts), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyCacheHits), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyCacheMiss), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyCacheTimeouts), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyErrPms), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyAuthBadCertErr), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyAuthBadCNErr), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyBadDNCErr), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyBadCRLErr), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyInBytes), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyOutBytes), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyTotalReq), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyTotalConn), latest(kentik.snmp.sslProxyCurrentConn) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrTotReqAccepted), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrTotReqActive), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrTotReqRejected), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrTotSuccess), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrTotRefused), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrTotTimedout), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrAvgReqPerConn), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrTotResponse), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrAvgResTime), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrMaxResTime), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrMinResTime), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrNumReqEnqueue), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrNumFreeConn), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrNumOpeningConn), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrNumConn), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrNumIBDisabled), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrNumOOBDisabled), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrNumOOBEnabled), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrLastDisabledTime), latest(sslSrvrState), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrInBytes), latest(kentik.snmp.sslSrvrOutBytes) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqLimitUrlLenOFErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqLimitQueryLenOFErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqLimitReqLenOFErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqLimitCookieLenOFErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqLimitHdrCntOFErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqLimitHdrLenOFErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqLimitContentLenErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqLimitBlkdMethodErr) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqSrvcNoOfUrlProfMatched), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqSrvcNoOfAppProfViol), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsReqSrvcTotProfViol) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsLrnSrvcUpdatesByReq), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsLrnSrvcUpdatesByRsp), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsLrnSrvcTotUpdatesByReq), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsLrnSrvcTotUpdatesByRsp), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsLrnSrvcTotUrlUpdated), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsLrnSrvcTotParamsLearned), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsLrnSrvcTimeLastUpdated), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsLrnSrvcTimeLocked) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlAclProcessAclHits), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlAclPolicyHits), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlAclTimeStamp), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlAclAllowAclHits) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlNormEncodingErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlNormSlashDotInUrlErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlNormTildaInUrl), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlNormCharSetEncodingErr) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsCookieSecEncrypted), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsCookieSecTampered), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsCookieSecNumCookieAllow), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsCookieSecNumCookieSet), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsCookieSecNumCookieErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsCookieSecCookieDecErr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsCookieSecCookieDecrypted) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlMissingCookie), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlNoAuthHdr), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlInvalidCookie), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlExpiredCookie), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlAccessDenied), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlGenFailure), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlAccessAttempts), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlAccessAttemptsTotRtt), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlInvalidSrcIp), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlAuthCacheHits), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlAuthCacheMiss), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlAuthCacheExp), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsAccessCtrlTimeStamp) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max
From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsHdrAclHits), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsHdrAclTimeStamp) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsRCTotServed), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsRCTotQueued), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsRCTotDropped), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsRCTotOutOfResource), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsRCTimeStamp) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsWebAddrTransReqUrlTrans), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsWebAddrTransRspUrlTrans), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsWebAddrTransReqUrlReWritten), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsWebAddrTransReqHdrReWritten), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsWebAddrTransRspHdrReWritten), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsWebAddrTransReqReDirection), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsWebAddrTransTimeStamp) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max

From Metric select latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlPolicyTotServed), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlPolicyTotQueued), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlPolicyTotDropped), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlPolicyTotOutOfResource), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlPolicyEntryCtrlAuth), latest(kentik.snmp.ipsUrlPolicyTimeStamp) FACET Index where instrumentation.name = 'barracuda-waf' limit max
